definition: (international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: To enhance the correctness of curtain, card, material and warrant.
sentences.chinese: 提高库存料件的帐，卡，物和单证输入的准确率。

sentences.english: Such documents that are issued by the carrier shall not be negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 承运人签发的此类单证不得转让。

sentences.english: In case documents presented with discrepancies, a discrepancy fee of USD 15.00.
sentences.chinese: 若单证不符，一个不符点扣15美元手续费。

sentences.english: Through various documents and the transfer of powers and responsibilities of risk transference.
sentences.chinese: 通过各种单证的传递划分权责并转移风险。

sentences.english: Make import and export documents, and deal with the agendum.
sentences.chinese: 制作进出口单证，处理日常工作。

sentences.english: Maintain the import data, complete the archive files and manage the import documents.
sentences.chinese: 进口台账数据维护，完善归档资料及单证留档管理。

sentences.english: Please keep us advised should there be any problems with customs clearence.
sentences.chinese: 船开后，请与售货方协作，以保证单证的交接。

sentences.english: In addition, the continuation sheets will be numbered to indicate the number of continuation sheet(s) in a carnet.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还须为续页编号，以显示单证册的续页页数。

sentences.english: Party A shall re-submit the documents according to the requirements of Party B.
sentences.chinese: 甲方应当按照乙方的要求重新提交单证。

sentences.english: We will effect payment in due course upon receipt of your shipping documents.
sentences.chinese: 一俟收到贵司船务单证，我方将按时付款。

sentences.english: An extra photocopy of transport documents is to be submitted for our file.
sentences.chinese: 一份运输单证的照片复印本需要提交给我们存档用。

sentences.english: And before it, The Seller sends a copy of shipping documents though facsimile.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，卖方应通过传真发送一份运输单证。

sentences.english: Analyze the flaw of negotiation under guarantee for export documents.
sentences.chinese: 出口押汇单证瑕疵的法律责任分析等。

sentences.english: MC-047 giving full details of shipent. original fax and its transmission reports to accompany the original documents.
sentences.chinese: 与原单证一起的原件传真和传送报告。

sentences.english: A. carnet in cover page 3 have also been amended.
sentences.chinese: 单证册注意事项”亦有所修改。

pinyin: bu4 ke3 che4 xiao1 xin4 yong4 zheng4
